channel.title: lemon on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in lemon on Recipes

item.title: frog legs a la Béarnaise
item.description: 8 very fresh frog legs Go out at ease Pepper to taste Oil 3 fresh tomatoes 1 cup white wine Lemon juice (in abundance) The legs are seasoned well and sautéed with the oil. Then add the chopped fresh tomato and white wine and lemon juice. Let cool with some fine chopped herbs. Serve in shells.

item.title: Salvadorean rice and chicken
item.description: 2 cups rice coarse salt 5 cups of hot water 1 bay leaf 1 lemon husk lemon juice 6 poultry livers lard 1-2 onion in fine julienne 1 glass of marsala wine 1 pinch of salt 1 pinch of black pepper 1 pinch of cinnamon 2 teaspoons rice starch 1 cup warm milk Put in a clay pot the rice with the salt, water, bay leaf, a piece of lemon peel and a little lemon juice.
